218 /* Power status */
219 typedef union {
220  uint8_t u16 /* UINT16 access to power status */;
221  struct HWPL_PACK {
222  unsigned expansion /* Expansion power output */ :1;
223  unsigned expansion_vcc /* Expansion power output (vcc) */ :1;
224  unsigned led_power /* LED Power status */ :1;
225  };
226 } power_status_t;
227 
228 /* Power Control */
229 typedef union {
230  uint32_t u32 /* UINT32 access to power control */;
231  struct HWPL_PACK {
232  unsigned expansion:1;
233  unsigned expansion_vcc:1;
234  unsigned expansion_off:1;
235  unsigned led_enable:1;
236  unsigned led_disable:1;
237  unsigned led_brightness:1;
238  unsigned backlight_brightness:1;
239  unsigned button_reset:1;
240  unsigned vled_cal_enable:1;
241  };
242 } power_ctrl_t;
243 
244 /* HIO report */
245 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
246  power_ctrl_t power_ctrl /* Power control */;
247  button_t button[FOGO_HIO_BUTTON_TOTAL] /* Button status */;
248  power_status_t power_status /* Power status */;
249  uint32_t double_click_interval /* Time between clicks to be considered double clicks */;
250  uint32_t event_flags /* Events since last report (see fogo_event_t for bit definitions) */;
251  float led /* LED brightness */;
252  float backlight /* Backlight brightness */;
253 } fogo_sys_t;
